document_data.caption: A map showing the Villein Villa (labeled #34) in east Skuld.
document_data.name: Villein Villa
document_data.mainbody: The '''Villein Villa''' was a small castle located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Villein Villa was located in the eastern section of Skuld in the [[Skuld/Crafts District|Crafts District]] along the outer wall next to a market.
document_data.Activities: Anyone with the coin to spend, and the desire to sleep in a castle, could rent the Villein Villa for their needs.
